name: extraDNA
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

description.en: xHumanity is a new application based on blockchain technology that supports community building and social cross-interaction, peer-to-peer in both online and offline environments, including the most widely used social media platforms.

status_updates.description: xHumanity, a blockchain-powered social media platform, leverages human values, algorithms, and rules to empower the social community. The brand’s mission is to disrupt the current social ecosystem using the inherent power of blockchain. xHumanity gives people all over the world to freely associate, air their views, and network with their followers. xHumanity uses cutting-edge cryptography and distributed ledger technology to support reconciliation, freedom of speech, and consciousness.

Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, and more recently TikTok dominate people's online social lives. While their focus is on providing relevant content to users and serving the interests of advertisers, communication between users is lost on these platforms. Why is xHumanity the next step in the evolution of social networks? Because it gives users the ability to lead the conversation, create social groups that are relevant and vibrant while maintaining a reputation system that eliminates fake users.

extraDNA (XDNA) has been listed on BitMart for a while! To thank every user's attention and support, we are giving away a total of  10,400,000 XDNA (Approx. 5000 USD) to all participants in our XDNA Trade to Share Events!

Campaign Period: 8/11/2021 10:00 AM to 8/25/2021 10:00 AM (EDT)

Trade XDNA to share - 10,400,000 XDNA Giveaway !

We are pleased to announce that extraDNA (XDNA) Staking is now available on BitMart Staking starting from June 1, 2021. Through BitMart, every user can stake XDNA and earn up to 49% rewards on a monthly basis.

https://support.bmx.fund/hc/en-us/articles/1260807388030

BSC Airdrop, Farming & Staking!

In order to celebrate the new additions, xHumanity is very happy to announce that we are going to do a Giveaway (Airdrop) Event starting from Monday, 3rd May, 2021 with a 5,000 USD reward pool.
BEP20 XDNA deposit is also enabled at BitMart. For BSC farming, you can stake XDNA for up to 266% APY. And for staking, you can stake XDNA up to 149% APY.

BitMart will list extraDNA (XDNA) on our digital assets platform on March 31, 2021. The following trading pair will be available: XDNA/USDT. Please note the available dates for different functions below:

Deposit feature: 3/30/2021 10:00 AM (EDT)
Trade feature: 3/31/2021 10:00 AM (EDT)
Withdrawal feature: 4/1/2021 10:00 AM (EDT)

Excitement is often considered a feeling, but its a step that needs to be understood. Beyond magical feeling of excitement is the hidden secret to succeed. 

We are at the crossing of that exact zone. Be prepared for the "B"ig #surprise ahead.

https://xhumanity.org
